alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 10:41AM AKST until January 25 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FRONT WILL BRING SNOW TO HIGHER ELEVATIONS ON THE KLONDIKE HIGHWAY... .Another storm system will bring precipitation to the region. Cool air will persist at higher elevations resulting in accumulating snowfall above 1500 feet along the highway. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Klondike Highway, mainly above 1500 feet. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to areas of drifting and blowing snow as well as very strong winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Drivers should consider carrying a winter survival kit in vehicles.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
